::Decadel::

	Decadel keeps firing his flamethrowers around, insanely.  He then decides
that if he keeps waving them around all over the place, he might crisp one
of his Predacon comrades.  He decided to pick them off one by one.  His
first target was Grim Reaper.  He saw Grim Reaper blocking everyone's
shots.

	"Hey, try blocking this!!!!!!!" Decadel says as he fires both his
flamethrowers at Grim Reaper.
